# [Interview #1154: Calamity-Denver, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1154#1)

#### Dirigible

Have we seen a Svrakiss in a book so far?"

#### Brandon Sanderson

"Um...RAFO"
